Text:
[. RELEASE iNFO .]
                                        Kairo-COGENT

                  RELEASE DATE ..................  22/04/2013
                  DEVElOPER .....................  Richard Perrin
                  GENRE .........................  Adventure
                  LANGUAGE ......................  ENGLISH
                  RELEASE TYPE ..................  BiN/CUE
                  SIZE ..........................  22x15 MB
                  PROTECTION ....................  Bareback
                                            . . .
                  Enter the lost world of Kairo. Explore vast abandoned
                  monuments. Bring strange and ancient machinery back to
                  life. Slowly uncover the true purpose of Kairo and
                  fulfil a great destiny.

                  Kairo is an atmospheric 3D exploration and puzzle
                  solving game. Developed by Richard Perrin the creator
                  of the white chamber with music by Wounds.


                                    [. INSTALL NOTES .]

                  I. Unrar release, mount .cue, install the game
                  II. Play the awesome game!




                                    [.GRP GREETiNGS .]

                  FAiRLiGHT  |  RELOADED  |  JAGUAR  |  OUTLAWS  |  VACE

                  and all other respectable people in honorable groups


                                      [. CONTACT US .]
